com.dotmarketing.util.diff.html

Class TextNodeComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dotmarketing.util.diff.html.TextNodeComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<TextNode>, org.eclipse.compare.rangedifferencer.IRangeComparator

    public class TextNodeComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.eclipse.compare.rangedifferencer.IRangeComparator, java.lang.Iterable<TextNode>
    A comparator that generates a DOM tree of sorts from handling SAX events. Then it can be used to compute the difference between DOM trees and mark elements accordingly.
